name: Zabbix
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: Zabbix is an enterprise-class open source distributed monitoring solution for networks and applications.

matches.regexp: (?-mix:<a class="highlight" href="http:\/\/www\.zabbix\.com">Zabbix ([^\s]+) Copyright 2001-20[\d]{2} by Zabbix SIA<\/a>)
(?-mix:<a href="http:\/\/www\.zabbix\.com" class="highlight">ZABBIX ([^\s<]+)<\/a> Copyright 2001-20[\d]{2} by <a href="http:\/\/www\.zabbix\.com" class="highlight">SIA Zabbix<\/a>)
